alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 12:51PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Malheur County through 130 PM PDT... At 1250 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Brogan, or 31 miles west of Weiser, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buckbrush Poison Butte around 210 PM MDT. Sugarloaf Butte around 220 PM MDT. Westfall around 230 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
